name: Koi Coloring Brush Pen
description: A brush pen with Water-based dyestuff ink. Ideal for lettering, drawing, illustrating, designing, and so on. 48 colors and colorless blender available.

name: Pigma Micron
description: A reliable drawing pen beloved around the world. Introduced in 1982 as the pioneer of water-based pigment ink pen.

name: Pigma Micron PN
description: The unique plastic nib gives various width of lines with archival pigment ink.

name: Pigma Brush
description: Water-based pigment ink pen with brush nib . Ink dries quickly and does not bleed through a paper.

name: Microperm
description: Extra fine point permanent marker. Fast drying alcohol-based ink. Line width: 0.2mm, 0.4mm, and 0.5mm.
